message.entry: Optional parameters must be string or numeric.
Source base must be a real scalar.
Source base must be a finite real integer.
Source base must be greater than or equal to two.
The elements of the matrix are larger than the base can represent.
The binary input must be numeric or logical.
Input must contain only finite real positive integers.
The MSB flag must be the string 'right-msb' or 'left-msb'.
The number of input arguments must be between 1 and 3, inclusive.
